The parties entering this Memorandum of Understanding ( MOU ) have agreed to form a collaboration and so agree to the following:</span><br style=\"line-height:22.3999996185303px;\" /><br style=\"line-height:22.3999996185303px;\" /><strong style=\"line-height:22.3999996185303px;\">Purpose and Scope</strong><br style=\"line-height:22.3999996185303px;\" /><br style=\"line-height:22.3999996185303px;\" /><span style=\"line-height:22.3999996185303px;\">To form a collaboration whereby Exact Media, as agency, will represent Bad Boy in a partnership with brands who want to promote their product(s), sample(s), and/or coupon(s). Under terms of an agreement to be negotiated at a later date, Bad Boy will arrange for distribution of promotional items through its distribution channels (e.g. parcels, emails, website, etc.).
